pattpack.expr_1
Class Binary

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pattpack.expr_1.Binary
Direct Known Subclasses:
Add, Sub
public abstract class Binary
extends java.lang.Object
implements Expr

This abstract class defines the methods available in expressions consisting of a binary operator applied to two (sub)expressions, e.g., 3+4.

          The left and right subexpressions of this expression.
